sys_template.name: Security - A Suspicous File/Hyperlink/Email
sys_template.template:
short_description=Suspicious File/Hyperlink/Email^instructions=If the user is reporting a suspicious email, please follow knowledge article KM37996 urgently.
If the user is reporting a suspicious file or process or URL that is not from an email: Did the File/URL/Process come back as risky on VirusTotal.com? (Use Process Explorer for processes) Y/N Has the user clicked/opened the file/link? Y/N If "Yes", then run malware checks, as per the knowledge article KM25685.
Please be aware of the situations described in the knowledge articles, which require you to escalate to a Senior. If you get 10 or more occurrences in an hour, raise a Parent Incident and inform Incident Management, Security, and a Senior.^affected_system=Email^cmdb_ci=^close_notes=^contact_type=phone^impact=1^category=Security^subcategory=Malicious Email^close_code=Solved (Permanently)
